verses.roman:
hasta tuli' rahena prabhu, nā karena bhojana
tabe paṇḍita kahena kichu saprema vacana

synonyms: hasta tuli'-raising His hands; rahena prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu remained; nā karena bhojana—did not eat; tabe—at that time; paṇḍita kahena—Jagadānanda said; kichu—some; sa-prema vacana—words with great affection and love.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu kept His hands raised and would not accept the prasāda until Jagadānanda Paṇḍita, with great affection and love, spoke the following words.
